title: Mount Rushmore National Memorial: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit         Visitors walk along the Avenue of Flags with Mount Rushmore in the background. NPS Photo  Nearly three million people visit Mount Rushmore each year. The busiest months are June, July and August. May, September and October are less busy and popular months to visit as well. Use the links below to plan your visit to Mount Rushmore and the surrounding Black Hills. Basic Information Directions and Transportation Eating and Sleeping Places to Go Things to Do Trip Itineraries Calendar Safety Accessibility Nearby Attractions
